instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Keyboard stops working after a few days
threads.message:
Clean board and clean keyboard/trackpad no drops.

Came in 3 times, all we do is disconnect and re-connect the keyboard and all works fine again, but after a few days it stops working again, when that happens if an external keyboard and mouse is connected those work fine.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Keyboard stops working after a few days
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Keyboard stops working after a few days
threads.message: Only keyboard stops to work, trackpad still good?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Keyboard stops working after a few days
threads.message:
Yes, touchpad cable is new, trackpad looks perfect under microscope.

When the problem happens only keyboard stops working.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Keyboard stops working after a few days
threads.message: The problem happens after a few days of use that is why is so hard to diagnose

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Keyboard stops working after a few days
threads.message:
Change trackpad board.
Keyboard matrix encoder is there.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Keyboard stops working after a few days
threads.message: By trackpad board you mean change the trackpad entirely?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Keyboard stops working after a few days
